trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event to customize the conversion of a cell value into a format suitable for display or to customize the appearance of a cell depending on its state or value.
trans-unit.target: 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>이벤트 셀 값을 표시 하기 위해 적합 한 형식으로 변환 하거나 상태 또는 값에 따라 셀의 모양을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>이 이벤트는 각 셀을 그릴 하지 않아야 시간이 오래 걸리는이 이벤트를 처리할 때 처리 될 때마다 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: This event also occurs when the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is retrieved or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트에도 발생 때 셀 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>검색 또는 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A>메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is initialized with the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>이벤트에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 셀 값으로 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 표시 값을 사용자 지정 변환 셀 값에서 제공 하는 경우 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 셀에 의해 지정 된 형식의 새 값이 있는지 확인 하는 변환 된 값을 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 더 이상 값 서식 지정이 필요 없음을 나타내려면 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the event handler completes, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> is formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties of the cell style returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which is initialized using the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 완료 되었을 때 이벤트 처리기는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>은 `null` 없거나 올바른 형식의 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>사용 하 여 포맷 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>의해 반환 된 셀 스타일의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>셀을 사용 하 여 초기화 된 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the display properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are used to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: 값에 관계 없이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성, 반환 되는 개체의 표시 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성은 셀을 렌더링 하는 데.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.FormattingApplied%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom formatting using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 서식 사용에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>이벤트 참조 [하는 방법: Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤에서 사용자 지정 데이터 형식](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트를 처리할 때 성능 저하를 방지 하려면 셀에 셀에 직접 액세스 하는 대신 이벤트 처리기의 매개 변수를 통해 액세스 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing> event.
trans-unit.target: 서식이 지정 된 사용자 지정 값을 실제 셀 값으로 변환을 사용자 지정 하려면 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellParsing>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `desiredType` parameter represents the type that the `value` parameter should be converted to, and `desiredType` is assigned the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `desiredType` 매개 변수 유형을 나타내는 하는 `value` 매개 변수 형식으로 변환 될 해야 및 `desiredType` 셀의 할당 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a cell is formatting picture names as bitmaps, `value` is the <xref:System.String> that contains the picture name, and `desiredType` is a <xref:System.Type> representing the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> type.
trans-unit.target: 셀에 비트맵으로 그림 이름 서식을 지정 하는 경우 등 `value` 은 <xref:System.String>그림 이름을 포함 하 고 `desiredType` 은 <xref:System.Type>나타내는 <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>형식.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event handler does not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property to a type that can be displayed by the cell, the cell contents will be formatted using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>이벤트 처리기를 설정 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>속성을 사용 하 여 내용을 포맷할 셀 셀에 의해 표시 될 수 있는 형식에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시킨 있는 셀의 열 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시킨 있는 셀의 행 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: 셀의 내용입니다.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert `value` to.
trans-unit.target: 변환할 형식을 `value` 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The style of the cell that caused the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 시킨 있는 셀의 스타일입니다.

trans-unit.source: columnIndex is less than -1 -or- rowIndex is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: columnIndex-1 보다 작은-또는- rowIndex -1 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 형식이 지정 되는 셀의 스타일을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Setting the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property will change how the cell and its contents are displayed.
trans-unit.target: CellStyle 속성에서 반환 된 개체의 속성을 설정 하면 셀 및 해당 내용을 표시 되는 방식을 변경 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance penalties, use this property to change the cell styles rather than accessing the cell directly.
trans-unit.target: 성능 저하를 방지 하려면 셀에 직접 액세스 하지 않고 셀 스타일을 변경 하려면이 속성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: 셀 스타일에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 셀 스타일](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the display style of the cell being formatted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> 서식이 지정 되는 셀의 표시 스타일을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*> property.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 셀의 값 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 서식을 지정할 셀의 열 인덱스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the ColumnIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: ColumnIndex 속성을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> 으로 인덱스를 가져올 수

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 서식을 지정할 셀의 열 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell value has been successfully formatted.
trans-unit.target: 셀 값 성공적으로 포맷 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event, set the FormattingApplied property to `true` after setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> property if no further value formatting is required.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>FormattingApplied 속성을 설정 하는 이벤트를 `true` 설정한 후의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A>서식을 추가 값이 필요한 경우 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ConvertEventArgs.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>

trans-unit.source: If the FormattingApplied property value is `false` when the event handler exits, the formatting will be applied to the value as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FormattingApplied 속성 값이 `false` 나타내듯이 값에 서식을 이벤트 처리기 종료 될 때 적용 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>에서 반환 된 개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellFormattingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.DataSourceNullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the formatting for the cell value has been handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>셀 값에 대 한 서식을 처리 된 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 서식을 지정할 셀의 행 인덱스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to obtain an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 속성을 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A> 으로 인덱스를 가져올 수

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 서식을 지정할 셀의 행 인덱스입니다.
